snippet: Oklahoma has suspended the freshman running back Joe Mixon for the season after he pleaded not guilty to a misdemeanor charge of assault.
abstract: Oklahoma football team suspends freshman running back Joe Mixon for the season after he pleaded not guilty to misdemeanor charge of assault for knocking a woman unconscious with a punch to the face.
lead_paragraph: Oklahoma has suspended the freshman running back Joe Mixon for the season after he pleaded not guilty to a misdemeanor charge of assault.
